events.title: Q4 Planning Meeting
events.description: Quarterly planning session to discuss goals and objectives for Q4. All department heads are required to attend.

events.title: Machine Learning Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering the latest developments in machine learning and AI. Bring your laptops!

events.title: Team Building Event
events.description: Fun team building activities and games. Food and drinks will be provided. Family members welcome!

events.title: Agile Methodology Training
events.description: Comprehensive training on Agile development methodologies, Scrum, and Kanban practices.

events.title: Product Demo Day
events.description: Showcase of new product features and upcoming releases. Open to all employees.
